results.input: I hereby bequeath all my personal property to my children, to be divided equally among them.
results.translation: I give all my personal property to my children, shared equally among them.

results.input: The party of the first part shall indemnify and hold harmless the party of the second part.
results.translation: The first party will indemnify and hold harmless the second party.

results.input: Time is of the essence in the performance of all obligations under this Agreement.
results.translation: Time is of the essence in the performance of all obligations under this Agreement.

results.input: This Agreement shall be binding upon the heirs, successors, and assigns of the parties.
results.translation: This Agreement will be binding upon the heirs, successors, and assigns of the parties.

results.input: Any evidence obtained in violation of the Fourth Amendment shall be inadmissible in a criminal prosecution.
results.translation: Any evidence obtained in violation of the Fourth Amendment will be inadmissible in a criminal prosecution.

results.input: The defendant has the right to remain silent and to have an attorney present during questioning.
results.translation: The defendant has the right to remain silent and to have an attorney present during questioning.

results.input: Probable cause must exist before a search warrant may be issued.
results.translation: Probable cause must exist before a search warrant may be issued.

results.input: The buyer shall obtain title insurance at their own expense and the seller shall deliver a warranty deed at closing.
results.translation: The buyer will obtain title insurance at their own expense and the seller will deliver a warranty deed at closing.

results.input: The grantor hereby conveys to the grantee all right, title, and interest in the above-described property.
results.translation: The grantor transfers all ownership rights in the described property to the grantee.

results.input: Subject property is sold 'as is' with all faults, latent and patent.
results.translation: The property is sold in its current condition. The buyer accepts all defects, whether obvious or hidden, and the seller won’t make repairs or provide warranties.

results.input: The employee may not be terminated without cause during the initial probationary period.
results.translation: During the initial probationary period, the employer can only fire the employee for a valid reason.

results.input: Employee agrees not to disclose any confidential or proprietary information during or after employment.
results.translation: The employee will not share any confidential or proprietary information while employed or after leaving the company.

results.input: Employer shall provide thirty (30) days written notice prior to any reduction in force.
results.translation: Employer will provide thirty (30) days written notice before any reduction in force.

results.input: The custodial parent shall have the right to make decisions regarding the child's education, health care, and religious upbringing.
results.translation: The custodial parent will have the right to make decisions regarding the child's education, health care, and religious upbringing.

results.input: Child support payments shall be made in the amount of $500 per month, due on the first of each month.
results.translation: Child support payments will be made in the amount of $500 per month, due on the first of each month.

results.input: The parties agree to joint legal custody with primary physical custody to the mother.
results.translation: Both parents will share major decision-making for the child, and the child will live mostly with the mother.

results.input: The plaintiff seeks damages for injuries sustained in a car accident caused by the defendant's negligence.
results.translation: The plaintiff seeks damages for injuries sustained in a car accident caused by the defendant's negligence.

results.input: Defendant breached the duty of care owed to plaintiff, resulting in compensable damages.
results.translation: Defendant breached the duty of care owed to plaintiff, resulting in compensable damages.

results.input: Upon my death, the trustee shall distribute the remaining assets of the trust to my grandchildren.
results.translation: When I die, the trustee will give whatever is left in the trust to my grandchildren.

results.input: I revoke all prior wills and codicils made by me and declare this to be my last will and testament.
results.translation: I revoke all prior wills and codicils made by me and declare this to be my last will and testament.

results.input: I love movies and going to the cinema.
results.translation: This isn’t legal language; there’s nothing to translate.

results.input: The weather is really nice today.
results.translation: This isn't legal language; there's nothing to translate.

results.input: Can you help me with my homework?
